name: Shatter
description: A sudden, painfully intense ringing noise erupts from a point within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 3d8 thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. A creature made of inorganic material such as stone, crystal, or metal has disadvantage on the saving throw. A nonmagical object that isn’t being worn or carried also takes the damage if it’s in the spell’s area.
higherLevels: When cast with a slot of 3rd level or higher, damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2nd.
